Articles.Content:
How about we start a YouTube/Twitch series where we test out kommunity-built rockets/ships/planes etc., do challenges made by someone(we could use e challenge thread for that), and even make our own things for a challenge. Of course, all stock, no mods(maybe plugins that ont alter saves). If there is popular demand, we can make weekly specials where we show off mods we like and hate!

If SQUAD gets interested, this can become part of the Daily!

We can name the thing something like TopKerbal, KerbalGear, TopRocket etc.

If you think this is a good idea, leave a name suggestion too!

I really dislike it when people make polls that are extremely one-sided. If you're asking for peoples' opinions why not just make it "Yes" or "No" rather than making it "I'm completely with you" and "Screw you I'm a jerk"?

Just do it, start up a Thread and get submissions and kgo. You could have a theme each week, one week SSTO, one week pure speed, one week ergonomic (easy to fly), etc. I'd do it but my net is so slow that it takes days to upload a 10min video, even if I precompress it for the tubes.
I'm a great TopGear Fan so i like the idea ! Here some more Name Ideas: TopThrust , TopStage , TopBooster
TopStage would be logical. But how should we record it. We should wait for normal multiplayer to be possible.

Thanks guys! Once I get back home in the end of summer I am starting the thing under one of the suggested names by SkyRex and TheScareCake!

Maybe I can even get some of the KSPTV streamers or YT guys interested(like Harv, Scott etc.).

What about Jeb Clarkson, Bob Hammond and Bill "cpt. Slowey" May?

Kiriim would be the stig!

Some say that he has eaten snowballs from Duna, and that hes the reason the magic boulder disappeared. All we know is, HE'S THE STIG JEB

edit: can a mod tell me how to make a line scratch through the stig part?

edit: Use the "S" bbcode tag. Done it for you. c: --Technicalfool

Edited July 30, 2014 by technicalfool
I don't know why you wouldn't do mod crafts, considering how much more that would allow you to cover. Maybe you could do episodes for stock and then episodes for mods, that would be great.

Yeah!! Good idea!!

I personally liked the name "TopThrust"!

I even slapped something together

Edit: *Ahem*, quick edit before someone notices that I misspelled "thrust"

Edited July 31, 2014 by Thiagobs

KerbGear is what I'd say. I've got some posh and strange craft up my sleeve if your looking into submissions. Totally do this! And in the light of more KSP-TV streams wanted this could be pretty cool. Best of luck!

Yeah!! Good idea!!

I personally liked the name "TopThrust"!

I even slapped something together

http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b191/hellsoul/KSP/topthrust1r.png

http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b191/hellsoul/KSP/topthrust1b.png

http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b191/hellsoul/KSP/topthrust2.png

Edit: *Ahem*, quick edit before someone notices that I misspelled "thrust"

That looks quite nice! I might steal use that (with your perm of course).

I can make basic videos with transitions and music, but a cool intro like TopGear's will need some work. Anyone up for e job? Btw I will start this thing somewhere near August 22nd so be prepared!

Did somebody say TopGear?

Nice idea btw, hope you get it done. (I mean, how hard can it be?)

Edit: With the roads around KSC you could make a great track. "And across the line!"

Sure thing! feel free to use them in any way you like it!

Did somebody say TopGear?

Niiiiiiiiiiiice!! Did it went further than TopGear's own Reliant Robin?

Did somebody say TopGear?

http://i.imgur.com/M1R20Hs.png

Nice idea btw, hope you get it done. (I mean, how hard can it be?)

Edit: With the roads around KSC you could make a great track. "And across the line!"

That was the best TopGear episode to date. It is actually in the official Top 10 TopGear episodes!
Sounds good. Just don't reveal The Stig.

Sounds good. Just don't reveal The Stig.

The Stig is Jeb obviously. Who else?
